name: Cozy's Corner
description:
Join Cozy in their room, "Cozy's Corner", and relax while listening to their relaxing music - or add in your own to the Jukebox! 

  • Listen to Cozy's music playlist using the Jukebox - or add in your own tunes before visiting Cozy's Corner!
    (Add music to the "music" folder in the game files, then click the "refresh" button in the Jukebox for it to take effect.)
  • List down your tasks on the computer, then check them away once you're done!
  • Grow a plant in Cozy's plant pot while you go about your tasks, and watch as it grows up along with you!
  • As you get tired, feel free to rest on the bed - it's always a great way to pass the time ;>
